name: Hot Jigsaw Puzzles
description:
Hot Jigsaw Puzzle is a collection of 60 puzzles.
The protagonists of each puzzle are 10 fantastic girls in hot poses. Each of the girls has six images and as you progress you can see them in increasingly erotic behaviors. The difficulty level will also increase between the first and the last girl, going from a few elements to many.
You will have a maximum time to finish each puzzle.
When you complete the six puzzles of each girl, you will have access to a gallery about the girl.
Obviously you can play the same puzzle several times.
